languages.text: {n}Маражай сжимает руки на оружии.{/n} "Тебе не терпится убраться из Комморры... а мне не терпится нанести визит сестре. Будь уверен{mf||а}, она где-то неподалеку".
{n}Marazhai grips his weapon.{/n} "You cannot wait to leave Commorragh... and I cannot wait to pay my sister a visit. Rest assured, she is somewhere nearby."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай сжимает руки на оружии.{/n} "Тебе не терпится убраться из Комморры... а мне не терпится нанести визит сестре. Будь уверен{mf||а}, она где-то неподалеку".

languages.text: {n}Marazhai saisit son arme.{/n} « Vous avez hâte de quitter Commorragh... et j'ai hâte de rendre visite à ma sœur. Vous pouvez être {mf|certain|certaine} qu'elle est quelque part dans les parages. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grips his weapon.{/n} "You cannot wait to leave Commorragh... and I cannot wait to pay my sister a visit. Rest assured, she is somewhere nearby."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai saisit son arme.{/n} « Vous avez hâte de quitter Commorragh... et j'ai hâte de rendre visite à ma sœur. Vous pouvez être {mf|certain|certaine} qu'elle est quelque part dans les parages. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋握紧了武器。{/n}“你迫不及待想要离开科摩罗……而我迫不及待想要见我姐姐一面。放心，她就在这附近。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grips his weapon.{/n} "You cannot wait to leave Commorragh... and I cannot wait to pay my sister a visit. Rest assured, she is somewhere nearby."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋握紧了武器。{/n}“你迫不及待想要离开科摩罗……而我迫不及待想要见我妹妹一面。放心，她就在这附近。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは武器を握った。{/n}「お前はコモラフを離れるのが待ち遠しく…そして俺は我が姉を訪ねるのが待ち遠しい。安心しろ、彼女は近くにいる」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grips his weapon.{/n} "You cannot wait to leave Commorragh... and I cannot wait to pay my sister a visit. Rest assured, she is somewhere nearby."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは武器を握った。{/n}「お前はコモラフを離れるのが待ち遠しく…そして俺は我が姉を訪ねるのが待ち遠しい。安心しろ、彼女は近くにいる」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai greift nach seiner Waffe.{/n} "So wie Ihr es kaum erwarten könnt, Commorragh zu verlassen ... kann ich es kaum erwarten, meine Schwester einen Besuch abzustatten. Seid versichert, sie ist hier irgendwo in der Nähe."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grips his weapon.{/n} "You cannot wait to leave Commorragh... and I cannot wait to pay my sister a visit. Rest assured, she is somewhere nearby."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai greift nach seiner Waffe.{/n} "So wie Ihr es kaum erwarten könnt, Commorragh zu verlassen ... kann ich es kaum erwarten, meine Schwester einen Besuch abzustatten. Seid versichert, sie ist hier irgendwo in der Nähe."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai aprieta la empuñadura de su arma.{/n} «Tú no ves el momento de marcharte de Commorragh... y yo no veo el momento de hacerle una visita a mi hermana. {mf|Tranquilo|Tranquila}, está muy cerca de aquí, en alguna parte».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grips his weapon.{/n} "You cannot wait to leave Commorragh... and I cannot wait to pay my sister a visit. Rest assured, she is somewhere nearby."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai aprieta la empuñadura de su arma.{/n} «Tú no ves el momento de marcharte de Commorragh... y yo no veo el momento de hacerle una visita a mi hermana. {mf|Tranquilo|Tranquila}, está muy cerca de aquí, en alguna parte».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, silahına sarılıyor.{/n} "Sen Commorragh'tan çıkmak için sabırsızlanıyorsun, bense ablamı ziyaret etmek için. Merak etme, çok yakınımızda."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grips his weapon.{/n} "You cannot wait to leave Commorragh... and I cannot wait to pay my sister a visit. Rest assured, she is somewhere nearby."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai silahına sarılıyor.{/n} "Sen Commorragh'tan çıkmak için sabırsızlanıyorsun, bense ablama ziyarette bulunmak için. Merak etme, kendisi yakınlarda bir yerlerde."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
